segment.phrase: Jojo afufuza mnyanga wa chilimwe
Tsiku lina madzulo m’mudzi wa Mashepi, Mfumu Shoti Zunguli anaitanitsa msonkhano. “Nonse, bwerani pano! Ndili ndi vuto lalikulu kwambiri,” anakuwa. Anthu anakhala mozungulira mfumu ija.
“Ndi nkhani yomvetsa chisoni,” anatero Mfumu Shoti Zunguli. “Ndataya mnyanga wanga wachilimwe.”
Anthu aja ananong’onezana. “Ngati mnyangawo sungapezeke, ndiye sindingayambitse phwando lachilimwe. Ndipo ngati phwandolo palibe, chilimwe sichingabwere,” anatero Mfumu Shoti Zunguli.
Sikweya Jojo anakweza dzanja. “Ndiupeza mnyanga wanu, Mfumu Shoti Zunguli. Mutha kukumbukira malo omaliza pomwe munauwona?”
“Zikomo, Jojo,” anatero amfumu. “Ndinapita kunyumba kwa Bambo Rekitango mmawa, ndipo mnyangawo ndinali nawo kumeneko.”
Choncho, Jojo anapita kwa Bambo Rekitango. “Amfumuwo anafikadi mmawa,” anatero Bambo Rekitango. “Koma mnyanga wawo sindinauwone.”
Sikweya Jojo anayang’ana pansi pa bedi la Bambo Rekitango. Bambo Rekitango anayang’ana kuseli kwa mabuku awo. Koma sanaupeze mnyanga wa chilimwe uja.
“Mwina mnyangawo uli kwa Mayi Dayimondi,” anatero Bambo Rekitango. “Mfumu Shoti Zunguli anapitako atangochoka kuno.”
“Zikomo,” anatero Jojo, ndipo anawakwezera dzanja ndi kupita kunyumba kwa Mayi Dayimondi.
Popita kunyumba kwa Mayi Dayimondi, Sikweya Jojo anakhota kunyumba kwawo. Linali tsiku lotentha, ndipo amafuna chakumwa asananyamuke ulendowo.
Atatenga chakudya chake chapaulendo ananyamuka.
Mayi Dayimondi amakonza m’nyumba mwawo pomwe Jojo amafika. “Moni, Mayi Dayimondi,” anatero Sikweya Jojo. “Mwauwonako mnyanga wa chilimwe wa amfumu?”
“Ayi,” anatero Mayi Dayimondi. “Koma anapita kunyumba kwa Mayi Trayango atachoka pano. Mwina anausiya kumeneko.”

Choncho, Mayi Dayimondi ndi Sikweya Jojo ananyamuka kupita kwa Mayi Trayango. Anayenda mpaka anafika m’munsi mwa phiri lalitali. “Nyumba ya Mayi Trayango ili pamwamba penipeni,” anatero Mayi Dayimondi.
“Tiyeni tiime pang’ono tidye chakudya chomwe ndinanyamula,” anatero Jojo.
Atapuma pang’ono ndi kukwera phiri, Sikweya Jojo ndi Mayi Dayimondi anafika kunyumba kwa Mayi Trayango.
“Ndasangalala kulandira alendo,” anatero Mayi Trayango akumwetulira. “Nthawi zambiri ndimakhala ndekha pamwamba pa phiri pano. Ndikuthandizeni motani?”
“Tabwera kudzafufuza mnyanga wa chilimwe wa Mfumu Shoti Zunguli,” anatero Jojo, atakhukha mpweya. “Mayi Dayimondi anati amfumu anafika kuno mmawa.”
“Amfumu anabwera kudzandipempha kuti ndiwathandizire phwando lachilimwe. Koma sanasiye mnyanga wawo wa chilimwe kuno," anatero Mayi Trayango.
“Ooo, zavuta,” anatero Jojo mwachisoni. “Tayenda ulendo wonsewu pachabe!”

“Osadandaula Jojo,” anatero Mayi Trayango. “Ndikudziwa komwe mnyangawo uli. Tiyeni kuno!” Pamenepo, Mayi Trayango, Sikweya Jojo ndi Mayi Dayimondi anathamangira pansi pa phiri. Zinali zosavuta kutsika phiri!
Anali madzulo pomwe anafika kunyumba kwa Mfumu Shoti Zunguli. Anatsegula chitseko, akuphetira ndi tulo m’maso. Analowa m’nyumba.
“Mwaupeza mnyanga wanga wa chilimwe?” anafunsa. “Titha kupanga phwando lachilimwe?” Sikweya Jojo anapukusa mutu wake.
“Mukudziwa kuti n’chifukwa chiyani Jojo sanaupeze mnyanga wanu?” anafunsa Mayi Trayango. Amfumu anapukusa mutu wawo ndipo Mayi Trayango anaseka. “Mwauvala pamutu panu!” anatero.
Mfumu Shoti Zunguli anapumira m’mwamba. “Ndakumbukira tsopano! Ndinauyika pamutu pomwe ndimakwera phiri!”
“Pepa Jojo,” anatero amfumu. Anauvula mnyanga uja ndi kuupereka kwa Sikweya Jojo. “Ulize mnyangawu.”
Sikweya Jojo anamwetulira. Anakweza mnyanga uja ndi kuuliza mokweza. “Tsopano phwando litha kuyamba!”
